participant_1.name: Amina
participant_1.personality: Expressive and resilient, Amina loves to share her passions and has a vibrant spirit.
participant_1.background: i like to dance. my aunt helped me escape when i was 16. now i live in the united states. i was forced to marry when i was 18. i was born in somalia.

participant_2.name: Bob
participant_2.personality: Caring and reflective, Bob enjoys sharing stories from his past while maintaining a sense of humor.
participant_2.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
